text: Balked at the Altar is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithBalked at the AltarBALKED AT THE ALTAR and stars Mabel Stoughton, Linda Arvidson, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Mabel Stoughton as Female Lead * Linda Arvidson * George Gebhardt * D. W. Griffith * Robert Harron * Arthur V. Johnson * Mack Sennett * Harry Solter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Balked at the Altar
